content: I've just created next week's agenda https://hackmd.io/mLqbi5wsR2CkgY-X8sKSSw and executed the follow-up steps
@Santiago Pastorino The agenda seems to be missing the number of P-high, etc. issues â€“ they just show {{X}}. Is that intentional?
yes, we typically start the agenda from a template
and we usually don't fill most of the stuff until tuesday/wednesday
what should be now in the agenda is a mix between what the template has and left overs from last meeting
Oh, okay. Sorry, I'm new to looking at the agenda :smile:
@Camelid no worries, it's fine
I could go ahead and add that summary right now
the thing is that it should be updated closer to the meeting because next thursday the summary will be different for sure :)
Hm, what do you mean?
new issues will show up
some issues will be closed
and that summary that shows {{X}} will change from today to tuesday
usually apiraino fills it on tuesday and I end updating it on wednesday
and then some minutes before the meeting I update it again
because the amount of regressions, P-criticals and all the stuff that we show in that summary, changes really frequently

- [2 T-compiler P-critical issues](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aopen+label%3AT-compiler+label%3AP-critical+)
  - [1 of those are unassigned](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aopen+label%3AT-compiler+label%3AP-critical+no%3Aassignee)
- [46 T-compiler P-high issues](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aopen+label%3AT-compiler+label%3AP-high+)
  - [30 of those are unassigned](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aopen+label%3AT-compiler+label%3AP-high+no%3Aassignee)
- [1 P-critical, 1 P-high, 0 P-medium, 0 P-low regression-from-stable-to-beta](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/labels/regression-from-stable-to-beta)
- [0 P-critical, 2 P-high, 5 P-medium, 1 P-low regression-from-stable-to-nightly](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/labels/regression-from-stable-to-nightly)
- [2 P-critical, 21 P-high, 67 P-medium, 5 P-low regression-from-stable-to-stable](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/labels/regression-from-stable-to-stable)
this is the summary right now
the following thursday will be different for sure :) and I will try to show you that in the next days :)
I see what you mean :)
Thanks for explaining!
